meanings.sent1: Thyroiditis can cause swelling in the neck area.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with thyroiditis after examining her thyroid gland.
meanings.sent3: When the thyroiditis acted up, she joked that her neck was throwing a party.
meanings.sent4: The thyroiditis was like a fiery dragon breathing inflammation into her body.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing pain of thyroiditis made her feel like her neck was on fire.

meanings.definition: An autoimmune condition causing inflammation of the thyroid gland.
meanings.sent1: Her thyroiditis, an autoimmune disorder, required careful management.
meanings.sent2: The autoimmune thyroiditis caused her thyroid gland to become inflamed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous thyroiditis seemed to have a mind of its own, causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: The autoimmune thyroiditis was like a rebellious army attacking her thyroid gland.
meanings.sent5: The relentless nature of autoimmune thyroiditis made her feel like her body was betraying her.
